item.title: Control4 Flag
item.description: After doing some research on the control4 product, we found that there is a default root password. user password root t0talc0ntr0l4! Getting the flag The flag is located on the SD card, so we go look in /mnt/sd/ $ cd /mnt/sd/ $ ls Flag.txt flash lost+found We found the flag, and now we can cat it out and capture it.
